html:
Amify Wins Big at 2021 MarCom Awards

Amify, the first turnkey Amazon-as-a-service provider, announced today that 10 of its clients have won 2021 MarCom Awards for their outstanding Amazon presence. Amify won a combined three platinum, three gold, and six honorable mentions in the competition. The MarCom Awards honor companies that exceed industry standards for quality, creativity and resourcefulness.

The MarCom Awards are international awards hosted and judged by members of the Association of Marketing and Communication Professionals (AMCP). As one of the oldest and most prestigious creative awards, AMCP works to celebrate the creative professionals working in varying industries.

Amify helps its clients develop and manage their Amazon presence with a focus on strategic content and operational support.

“We pride ourselves on creating best-in-class content for our clients, and it's always exciting to have those efforts recognized," said Christine Mccambridge, SVP of Delivery, Amify. “Amify is committed to excellence and helping clients succeed, creating a better brand experience that will attract shoppers and drive sales. The unique and tailored insights Amify is able to provide, paired with the client’s knowledge creates a winning formula for success.”

Below are the clients who were named MarCom winners:

Platinum:

  • TALON Grips Amazon EcoSystem
  • Master Appliance Corp. Amazon EcoSystem
  • MobyFox Amazon EcoSystem

Gold:

  • Under the Weather Website Animation
  • Maty's Healthy Products Baby & Nasal Ads
  • VF Corporation Smartwool Listing - Hudson Trail Crew Sock

Honorable Mention:

  • Supreme Clean Amazon EcoSystem
  • Tin Star Foods Listing 100% Grass Fed Ghee
  • First Aid Beauty Listing URC Oatmeal Mask
  • Bequet Confections Summer Sale Email
  • Supreme Clean Website Content
  • Supreme Clean Website

Entries come from corporate marketing and communication departments, advertising agencies, public relations firms, design shops, production companies, and freelancers. For the 2021 awards, MarCom received over 6,000 entries from 41 countries.

About Amify

Amify is a turnkey Amazon-as-a-service provider that helps brands maximize their potential by providing complete strategy, management, and operational services to brands selling on Amazon, allowing partners to focus on other business needs. By partnering with Amazon Vendor Central and Seller Central sellers, Amify leverages data from their website, Amazon and digital advertising to implement strategies to maximize sales and profitability. Amify is headquartered in Arlington, VA, and has an additional office in Cincinnati, OH.

For more information, visit https://goamify.com/.

View source version on businesswire.com: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20211116005392/en/

Keelyn Leonard
REQ for Amify
amify@req.co
